mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERNUM, ROOMNAME, SEDATE, SETIME, DETAILNUM) VALUES (RESER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{roomName}, #{seDate}, #{seTime}, #{detailNum})
